title: Fort Pulaski National Monument: Education
body: History Comes Alive at Fort Pulaski! Bring your students to Fort Pulaski for a fun way to learn about social studies and other subjects--for free! Reserve a park ranger for a guided program. Or use one of our lesson plans to teach it your own way. The excitement begins at the sallyport (the front door).                 Load in nine times, Load! A musket-firing demonstration at Fort Pulaski is fun and educational for all ages. Contact the park to make a reservation. Read More        Do you know why math isn't fun? Because you don't have a cannon in your math class! Try "Cannons by the Numbers" at Fort Pulaski for math in a different way. Read More        Academic Fee Waivers Fill out and learn about Academic Fee Waiver guidelines. Read More        How did they move a 10,000-pound cannon? Find out how when you explore simple machines at Fort Pulaski. Have a park ranger work with your group or do our self-guiding simple machine activity. Read More
